title: Gary Whitta RUINS Kinda Funny Games Daily
description:
Gary is talking CANDY! 

From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PLJ23xG5srw 

New World Aeternum is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC! Get it here: https://bit.ly/3XROcCT
Phasmophobia releases on PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Wishlist now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010
Download the Marvel Snap app now available on the App Store, Google Play and Steam, or visit http://www.marvelsnap.com to learn more.
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------  
YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kindafunny/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
